# minimumAllowedMemorySize

**Type Property**

The minimum amount of memory that you may configure for the VM.

## Declaration

```swift
class var minimumAllowedMemorySize: UInt64 { get }
```

## Discussion

The value in the [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtualMachineConfiguration/memorySize] property must be greater than or equal to the value in this property.

## Sizing the memory partition

- **memorySize**: The amount of physical memory the guest operating system recognizes.
- **maximumAllowedMemorySize**: The maximum amount of memory that you may configure for the VM.
- **memoryBalloonDevices**: An array that you configure with a memory balloon device, used to update the memory in the VM.
